channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yet more fly tipping here!!!!, 19th July
item.description:
Why do Cheltenham Borough Council let this criminal offence, fly tipping, occur in this location every week? It’s been like this for years. Why do CBC think it’s acceptable for local residents to have to have rubbish repeatedly dumped in this area?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old broken clothes airer on path, 19th July
item.description:
This clothes airer has probably been left out for someone to take but it’s been here several weeks, now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andover Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very worn road markings, 18th July
item.description:
Colletts Drive, from junction with Tewkesbury Road through to mini roundabout (entrance to Tesco car park). Road markings very worn, especially at junction into Tesco filling station. Full re-marking needed along this whole stretch of road - white lines and also yellow lines.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colletts Drive, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Over grown tree encroachment, 18th July
item.description:
Hi, The trees along Hazel Way, Lobelys Drive require trimming. Particularly the tree outside of 22 Hazel Way Lobleys Drive has encroached over my property line and is now not far from actually touching my house. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Fast food as well in excess of 3 foot make it very dangerous to put out of Branch Road, 18th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Branch Road, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
